member.name: T:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.FareFieldInfo
member.summary: This class is used for getting and setting the fields which contains the bus fare information. Using this class, you can get or set the field contains the type of the bus fare, the start fare, the range of the start fare and the step of the fare.

member.name: M:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.FareFieldInfo.#ctor
member.summary: The default constructor, initializes a new instance of the FareFieldInfo class.

member.name: M:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.FareFieldInfo.#ctor(SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.FareFieldInfo)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the FareFieldInfo class which is a copy of the specified Feature3D object.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.FareFieldInfo.FareTypeField
member.summary: Gets or sets the field used to represent the type of the bus fare. 0 indicates Single, 1 indicates Distance, and 2 indicates Stops.
member.value: The default is a null string.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.FareFieldInfo.StartFareRangeField
member.summary: Gets or sets the field used to represent the range of the start fare.
member.value: The default is a null string.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.FareFieldInfo.StartFareField
member.summary: Gets or sets the field used to represent the start fare.
member.value: The default is a null string.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.FareFieldInfo.FareStepField
member.summary: Gets or sets the FareStepField. FareStepField is the price to add for adding each FareStepRangeField.
member.value: The default is a null string.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.FareFieldInfo.FareStepRangeField
member.summary: Gets or sets the fare step range field.
member.value: The default is a null string.

member.name: T:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.FareInfo
member.summary: The FareInfo class. This class is used to get the relative information about the bus fare, including the type of the bus fare, the start fare, the range of the start fare, and the step of the fare.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.FareInfo.Type
member.summary: Gets the type of the bus fare.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.FareInfo.StartFareRange
member.summary: Gets the range of the start fare.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.FareInfo.StartFare
member.summary: Gets the start fare.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.FareInfo.FareStep
member.summary: Gets the step of the fare.The step of the fare is the fare added for every stop or a unit distance.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.FareInfo.FareStepRange
member.summary: Gets the fare step range.

member.name: T:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferLine
member.summary: The transfer line class. This class is used to the get-on stop, get-down stop and the line name.

member.name: M:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferLine.#ctor(System.Int64,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initialize a new TransferLine object with the parameters specified.
member.param: The line ID of the transfer line.
The get-on stop ID of the transfer line.
The get-off stop ID of the transfer line.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferLine.OnName
member.summary: Gets the get-on name of the transfer line.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferLine.DownName
member.summary: Gets the get-off name of the transfer line.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferLine.LineName
member.summary: Gets the line name of the transfer line.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferLine.LineID
member.summary: Gets the line ID of the transfer line.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferLine.StartIndex
member.summary: Gets the index of the get-off stop of the transfer line. The number counts from 0.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferLine.EndIndex
member.summary: Gets the index of the get-on stop of the transfer line. The number counts from 0.

member.name: T:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferLines
member.summary: The transfer lines class. This class is used to get the transfer line and the count.

member.name: M:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferLines.GetEnumerator
member.summary: Returns an enumerator that can iterate through the collection.
member.returns: An IEnumerator object used to iterate through a collection.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferLines.Count
member.summary: Gets number of the transfer lines.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferLines.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the transfer line of the specified index.
member.param: The specified index, which begins with 0.
member.returns: Gets the transfer line of the specified index.

member.name: T:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferPreference
member.summary: This enumeration defines the transfer preference constants.

member.name: F:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferPreference.None
member.summary: None.

member.name: F:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferPreference.Bus
member.summary: Bus. If you set this, bus will be first considered during exchange. But the result way is composed by multiple parameters. So bus may not be contained.

member.name: F:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferPreference.Subway
member.summary: Subway. If you set this, subway will be first considered during exchange. But the result way is composed by multiple parameters. So subway may not be contained.

member.name: F:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferPreference.NoSubway
member.summary: No subway. If you set this, the subway won't be contained in the result.

member.name: T:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferSearchMode
member.summary: The enumeration defines the search mode constants during transfer.

member.name: F:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferSearchMode.ID
member.summary: ID mode. Use the start stop ID and the end stop ID as the start and the end of the interchange.

member.name: F:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferSearchMode.Point
member.summary: Point mode. Use any two points (Point2D) as the start and the end of the interchange.

member.name: T:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferAnalyst
member.summary: This class is used to make interchange analysis, query bus line, query bus stop, etc.

member.name: M:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferAnalyst.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs a new TransferAnalyst object.

member.name: M:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferAnalyst.Load(SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.LineSetting,SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.StopSetting,SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.RelationSetting)
member.summary: Loads the transfer data when making transfer analyst. Note that this method doesn't support multi-thread processing.
member.returns: Returns true if successful; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferAnalyst.Check(SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferAnalystSetting)
member.summary: Check the trasfer data based on TransferAnalystSetting. The check result will be written to the attribute table of the source data. Note that this method doesn't support multi-threading.
member.returns: A bool value that represents whether it has error. true, if there is no error; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferAnalyst.Load(SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferAnalystSetting)
member.summary: Loads the transfer data when making transfer analyst. Note that this method doesn't support multi-thread processing.
member.returns: Returns true if successful; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferAnalyst.FindTransferLines(SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferAnalystParameter)
member.summary: The transfer lines. Return the transfer analyst result.

member.name: M:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferAnalyst.FindTransferSolutions(SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferAnalystParameter)
member.summary: Make transfer analsyst based on the specified parameters. Return the transfer solutions.

member.name: M:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferAnalyst.GetDetailInfo(System.Int64,System.Int64,SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferLine[])
member.summary: Gets the complete transfer guide based on the start stop ID, the end stop ID and the items.

member.name: M:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferAnalyst.GetDetailInfo(SuperMap.Data.Point2D,SuperMap.Data.Point2D,SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferLine[])
member.summary: Gets the complete transfer guide based on the start, the end and the items.

member.name: M:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferAnalyst.FindLinesByStop(System.Int64)
member.summary: Finds the lines pass by the specified stop ID.
member.returns: The collection of bus lines that cross this stop.

member.name: M:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferAnalyst.FindStopsByLine(System.Int64)
member.summary: Finds the stops of the specified line ID.
member.returns: The collection of bus lines that cross this stop.

member.name: M:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferAnalyst.Dispose
member.summary: Releases the resources occupied by TransferAnalyst.

member.name: T:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferAnalystParameter
member.summary: This class is used to set the transfer analyst parameters, including start stop, end stop, solution count, walking ratio, tactic, preference, evade, etc.

member.name: M:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferAnalystParameter.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the TrafficTransferAnalystParameter class.

member.name: M:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferAnalystParameter.#ctor(SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferAnalystParameter)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the TrafficTransferAnalystParameter class which is identical with the specified TrafficTransferAnalystParameter object.

member.name: M:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferAnalystParameter.Dispose
member.summary: Releases the resources occupied by TransferAnalystParameter.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferAnalystParameter.StartStopID
member.summary: Gets or sets the ID of the start stop.
member.value: The default value is -1.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferAnalystParameter.EndStopID
member.summary: Gets or sets the ID of the end stop.
member.value: The default value is -1.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferAnalystParameter.StartPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets the start position.
member.value: The default is an empty Point2D object.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferAnalystParameter.EndPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets the end position.
member.value: The default is an empty Point2D object.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferAnalystParameter.SolutionCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum count of solutions to return in the transfer analysis. The maximum value is 20.
member.value: The default value is 5.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferAnalystParameter.WalkingRatio
member.summary: Gets or sets the ratio of walking to taking bus.
member.value: The default value is 10.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferAnalystParameter.Tactic
member.summary: Gets or sets the transfer tactic type.
member.value: The default value is TransferTactic.LessTransferã€‚.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferAnalystParameter.Preference
member.summary: Gets or sets transfer preference.
member.value: The default value is TransferPreference.None,there is no preference.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferAnalystParameter.SearchMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the search mode of the transfer.
member.value: The default value is ID mode,there is TransferSearchMode.ID.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferAnalystParameter.EvadeLines
member.summary: Gets or sets the line ID collection of the evade lines.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferAnalystParameter.EvadeStops
member.summary: Gets or sets the evade stop ID collection.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferAnalystParameter.PriorLines
member.summary: Gets or sets the prior line ID collection.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferAnalystParameter.PriorStops
member.summary: Gets or sets the prior stop ID collection.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferAnalystParameter.TravelTime
member.summary: Get or set travel time for bus transfer analysis.

member.name: T:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferAnalystResult
member.summary: The TransferAnalystResult class is used to get the TransferGuides.

member.name: M:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferAnalystResult.Dispose
member.summary: Releases the resources occupied by TransferAnalystResult.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferAnalystResult.TransferGuides
member.summary: Gets the array of the TransferGuide object.

member.name: T:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferAnalystSetting
member.summary: The settings for the parameter information in the traffic transfer analysis, including will determine the analysis result directly. It can set the information of the lines, the stops, the snapping tolerance, the merging tolerance and the walking tolerance.

member.name: M:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferAnalystSetting.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs a new TransferAnalystSetting object.

member.name: M:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferAnalystSetting.#ctor(SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferAnalystSetting)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance according to the specified TransferAnalystSetting object.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferAnalystSetting.LineSetting
member.summary: Gets or sets the LineSetting object.
member.value: The default value is null.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferAnalystSetting.StopSetting
member.summary: Gets or sets the StopSetting object.
member.value: The default value is null.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferAnalystSetting.RelationSetting
member.summary: Gets or sets the transfer relation setting.
member.value: The default value is null.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferAnalystSetting.SnapTolerance
member.summary: Gets or sets the snapping tolerance of the bus stops.
member.value: The default value is 0.1.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferAnalystSetting.MergeTolerance
member.summary: Gets or sets the merging tolerance of the bus stops. Obsolete. From version 7.0.1, you don't need to set the merging tolerance of the bus stops.
member.value: The default value is 100.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferAnalystSetting.WalkingTolerance
member.summary: Gets or sets walking threshold, that is the maxinum walking distance from the current stop to the transfer stop.
member.value: The default value is 1500.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferAnalystSetting.Unit
member.summary: Gets or sets the unit of the snap tolerance, merge tolerance and walking tolerance.
member.value: The default value is Unit.Meter.

member.name: T:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferGuide
member.summary: With this class, you can get the guide items, interchange count, distance, cost, time, etc.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferGuide.Count
member.summary: Gets the count of the TransferGuideItem objects in the TransferGuide.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferGuide.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the TransferGuideItem object according to the specified index.
member.param: The specified index which start with 0.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferGuide.TotalDistance
member.summary: Gets the total distance of transfer guide.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferGuide.TotalFare
member.summary: Gets the total cost of transfer guide.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferGuide.TotalTime
member.summary: Gets the total distance of transfer guide.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferGuide.TransferCount
member.summary: Gets the count of transfer in the current scheme. One traffic transfer scheme may have the segment represented by the TransferGuideItem object which is passed by walk, so the TransferCount property of the TransferGuide object does not equal to the Count property of it.

member.name: T:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferGuideItem
member.summary: This class is used to get the transfer guide items, including walking or by bus, the start and the end of walking, the start and the end of the bus line, index, distance, cost and time, etc.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferGuideItem.LineName
member.summary: Gets a line name represented by the guide item. It is valid only when IsWalking is false.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferGuideItem.LineType
member.summary: Gets a line type represented by the guide item. This can be obtained from the LineTypeField property of LineSetting. It is valid only when IsWalking is false.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferGuideItem.StartName
member.summary: Gets the get-on stop name on a guide item represented by the guide item. It is valid only when IsWalking is false.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferGuideItem.EndName
member.summary: Gets the get-off line name represented by the guide item. It is valid only when IsWalking is false.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferGuideItem.StartIndex
member.summary: Gets the index of the end stop of the segment represented by the TransferGuideItem object in the whole traffic line which the segment belongs to. It is valid only when IsWalking is false.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferGuideItem.EndIndex
member.summary: Gets the index of the start stop of the segment represented by the TransferGuideItem object in the whole traffic line which the segment belongs to. It is valid only when IsWalking is false.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferGuideItem.PassStopCount
member.summary: Gets the number of the stops this segment represented by the TransferGuideItem object has.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferGuideItem.StartPosition
member.summary: Gets the coordinates of the get-on/start stop of the segment represented by the TransferGuideItem object.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferGuideItem.EndPosition
member.summary: The coordinates of the get-off/end stop of the segment represented by the TransferGuideItem object.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferGuideItem.Distance
member.summary: Gets the distance of the segment represented by the TransferGuideItem object.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferGuideItem.Fare
member.summary: Gets the fare of the segment represented by the TransferGuideItem object.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferGuideItem.Time
member.summary: Gets the time of the segment represented by the TransferGuideItem object.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferGuideItem.IsWalking
member.summary: Gets whether the TransferGuideItem represents walk path.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferGuideItem.Route
member.summary: Gets the distance of the segment represented by the TransferGuideItem object.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferGuideItem.FirstTime
member.summary: Gets the first bus departure time of the segment represented by the TransferGuideItem object.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferGuideItem.LastTime
member.summary: Gets the end bus departure time of the segment represented by the TransferGuideItem object.

member.name: T:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.LineInfo
member.summary: The TransferLineInfo object includes Dataset, ID, Name, FirstTime, LastTime, Interval, Speed, FareInfo, TotalDistance, TotalWeight and StopCount.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.LineInfo.ID
member.summary: Gets the SMID of the line.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.LineInfo.LineID
member.summary: Gets the ID of the line.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.LineInfo.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the line.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.LineInfo.Alias
member.summary: Gets the alias of the line.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.LineInfo.StartTime
member.summary: Gets the time of the first bus of the traffic line.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.LineInfo.TerminalTime
member.summary: Gets the time of the last bus of the line.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.LineInfo.Interval
member.summary: Gets the interval between every two buses of the line.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.LineInfo.Speed
member.summary: Gets the speed of the bus of the line.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.LineInfo.FareInfo
member.summary: Gets the bus fare information.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.LineInfo.TotalDistance
member.summary: Gets the distance of the line.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.LineInfo.TotalFare
member.summary: Gets the total fare of the line.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.LineInfo.TotalTime
member.summary: Gets the total time.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.LineInfo.StopCount
member.summary: Gets the number of the stops the line has.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.LineInfo.LineType
member.summary: Gets the line type.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.LineInfo.TotalLine
member.summary: Gets the total line. It is a GeoLine object.

member.name: T:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.LineSetting
member.summary: The TransferLineSetting class.This class is used for setting the traffic line.

member.name: M:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.LineSetting.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs a new LinkSettings object.

member.name: M:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.LineSetting.#ctor(SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.LineSetting)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the LineSetting class which is identical with the specified LineSetting.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.LineSetting.Dataset
member.summary: Gets or sets the bus line dataset. It must be a line dataset. If you set it to other type, an exception will be thrown.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.LineSetting.LineIDField
member.summary: Gets or sets the bus line ID field. This field is required. It must be 32-bit or 64-bit. If it is other type, an exception will be thrown.
member.value: The default is a null string.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.LineSetting.NameField
member.summary: Gets or sets the name field of the bus line. It is required. If this field doesn't exist in the line dataset, an exception will be thrown.
member.value: The default is a null string.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.LineSetting.LengthField
member.summary: Gets or sets the length field of the transfer line. The unit is in meters.
member.value: The default is a null string.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.LineSetting.AliasField
member.summary: Gets or sets the alias field of the transfer line.
member.value: The default is a null string.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.LineSetting.FirstTimeField
member.summary: Gets or sets the time field of the first bus of the traffic line. Field type must be the time type of DateTime.
member.value: The default is a null string.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.LineSetting.LastTimeField
member.summary: Gets or sets the time field of the end bus of the traffic line. Field type must be the time type of DateTime.
member.value: The default is a null string.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.LineSetting.IntervalField
member.summary: Gets or sets the field of the interval between every two buses of the traffic line.
member.value: The default is a null string.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.LineSetting.SpeedField
member.summary: Gets or sets the speed field of the bus of the line.
member.value: The default is a null string.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.LineSetting.FareFieldInfo
member.summary: Gets or sets the fields about the fare of the traffic line.
member.value: The default is a null FareFieldInfo object.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.LineSetting.LineTypeField
member.summary: Gets or sets the bus line type field.
member.value: The default is a null string.

member.name: T:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.RelationSetting
member.summary: The RelationSetting class. This class sets the stop&line relation dataset, stop&gateway relation dataset, and network dataset.

member.name: M:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.RelationSetting.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new RelationSetting object.

member.name: M:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.RelationSetting.#ctor(SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.RelationSetting)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the RelationSetting class which is a copy of the specified RelationSetting object.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.RelationSetting.Dataset
member.summary: Gets or set the stop&line relation dataset. It must be a tabular dataset. If you set it to other type, an exception will be thrown.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.RelationSetting.StopIDField
member.summary: Gets or sets the stop ID field of the stop&line relation dataset. This field is required. It must be 32-bit or 64-bit. If there is no this type or it is other type, an exception will be thrown.
member.value: The default is a null string.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.RelationSetting.LineIDField
member.summary: Gets or sets the line ID field of the stop&line relation dataset. This field is required. It must be 32-bit or 64-bit. If there is no this type or it is other type, an exception will be thrown.
member.value: The default is a null string.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.RelationSetting.SerialNumField
member.summary: Gets or sets the serial number field of the stop&line relation dataset.
member.value: The default is a null string.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.RelationSetting.DatasetPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the stop&gateway dataset. It must be a line dataset. If you set it to other type, an exception will be thrown.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.RelationSetting.ExitIDField
member.summary: Gets or sets the gateway ID field of the stop&gateway relation dataset. This field is required. It must be 32-bit or 64-bit. If there is no this type or it is other type, an exception will be thrown.
member.value: The default is a null string.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.RelationSetting.StationIDField
member.summary: Gets or sets the stop ID field of the stop&gateway relation dataset. This field is required. It must be 32-bit or 64-bit. If there is no this type or it is other type, an exception will be thrown.
member.value: The default is a null string.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.RelationSetting.ExitNameCField
member.summary: Gets or sets the gateway name field for the stop&gateway relation dataset.
member.value: The default is a null string.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.RelationSetting.ExitNamePYField
member.summary: Gets or sets the gateway pinyin field for the stop&gateway relation dataset.
member.value: The default is a null string.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.RelationSetting.DatasetNetwork
member.summary: Gets or sets the network dataset. Get the real walking path according to the edge and node information.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.RelationSetting.EdgeIDField
member.summary: Gets or sets the edge ID field of the network dataset.
member.value: The default is a null string.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.RelationSetting.NodeIDField
member.summary: Gets or sets the node ID field of the network dataset.
member.value: The default is a null string.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.RelationSetting.FNodeIDField
member.summary: Gets or sets the field that identifies the ID of the start node in the network dataset.
member.value: The default is a null string.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.RelationSetting.TNodeIDField
member.summary: Gets or sets the field that identifies the ID of the end node in the network dataset.
member.value: The default is a null string.

member.name: T:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.StopInfo
member.summary: This class is used for getting the information of transfer stop, including the dataset that the stop belongs to, ID, name, and alias of the stop.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.StopInfo.ID
member.summary: Gets the SMID of the stop.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.StopInfo.StopID
member.summary: Gets the ID of the stop.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.StopInfo.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the stop.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.StopInfo.Alias
member.summary: Gets the alias of the stop.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.StopInfo.Position
member.summary: Gets the position of the stop.

member.name: T:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.StopSetting
member.summary: The StopSetting class. This class is used for getting the settings of the transfer stop, including the dataset that the stop belongs to, the name field of the stop, and the alias field of the stop.

member.name: M:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.StopSetting.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs a new StopSetting object.

member.name: M:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.StopSetting.#ctor(SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.StopSetting)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the StopSetting class which is a copy of the specified StopSetting object.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.StopSetting.Dataset
member.summary: Gets or sets the stop dataset. It must be a point dataset. If you set it to other type, an exception will be thrown.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.StopSetting.StopIDField
member.summary: Gets or sets the bus stop ID field. This field is required. It must be 32-bit or 64-bit. If it is other type, an exception will be thrown.
member.value: The default is a null string.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.StopSetting.NameField
member.summary: Gets or sets the name field of the bus stop. It is required. If this field doesn't exist in the stop dataset, an exception will be thrown.
member.value: The default is a null string.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.StopSetting.AliasField
member.summary: Gets or sets the alias field of the transfer stop.
member.value: The default is a null string.

member.name: T:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferSolution
member.summary: The transfer solution class. This class is used to get the count of the interchange, and the transfer lines with the given index.

member.name: M:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferSolution.GetEnumerator
member.summary: Returns an enumerator that can iterate through the collection.
member.returns: An IEnumerator object used to iterate through a collection.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferSolution.TransferTime
member.summary: Gets the count of the interchange.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferSolution.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the Items with the given index.
member.param: The specified index, which begins with 0.
member.returns: The transfer lines with the given index.

member.name: T:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferSolutions
member.summary: The transfer solutions class. This class is used to get the transfer solution with the given index, and the count of the solutions.

member.name: M:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferSolutions.GetEnumerator
member.summary: Returns an enumerator that can iterate through the collection.
member.returns: An IEnumerator object used to iterate through a collection.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferSolutions.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the transfer solution with the given index.
member.param: The specified index, which begins with 0.
member.returns: The transfer solution with the given index.

member.name: P:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferSolutions.Count
member.summary: Gets the count of the solutions.

member.name: T:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferTactic
member.summary: This enumeration defines the transfer tactic constants.

member.name: F:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferTactic.LessTransfer
member.summary: Less interchange. Find the less interchange count from the start to the end.

member.name: F:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferTactic.MinDistance
member.summary: Minimum distance. Find the shortest distance from the start to the end.

member.name: F:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferTactic.LessWalk
member.summary: Less walking. Find the less walking distance from the start to the end.

member.name: F:SuperMap.Analyst.TrafficAnalyst.TransferTactic.LessTime
member.summary: Less time. Find the least time cost from the start to the end.
